dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 3423 EH: FROST Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.official-title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to include aircraft deicing storage facilities in the definition of airport development, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Facility for Runway Operations and Safe Transportation Act or the FROST Act.
Section 47102(3)(B)(v) of title 49, United States Code, is amended by striking and storage facilities for the equipment and fluids.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives September 8, 2025.
